message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to start the price at $14,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is significantly higher than that to me. Could you do $13,000? I'm confident you won't regret it.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Could you consider $11,500? I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offers.
